member.summary: Packet contains a part of a message.

member.summary: The packet types passed as plaintext.

member.summary: Report an error to the sender.

member.name: F:Goedel.Protocol.Presentation.PlaintextPacketType.ClientInitial
member.summary: Plaintext request to establish a new connection to the host. This is only used in cases where the client does not have the public key of the host.

member.name: F:Goedel.Protocol.Presentation.PlaintextPacketType.ClientExchange
member.summary: Encrypted request to establish a new connection to the host. This MAY be used in cases where the client has the public key of the host.

member.summary: Client completion of key exchange.

member.summary: Client completion of key exchange.

member.summary: Present a challenge to a client requesting a connection.

member.summary: Host completion of key exchange.

member.summary: The request was refused for reasons reserved to the responder.

member.name: T:Goedel.Protocol.Presentation.Credential
member.summary: Base class for presentation credentials.

member.name: M:Goedel.Protocol.Presentation.Credential.AddEphemerals(System.Collections.Generic.List{Goedel.Protocol.Presentation.PacketExtension},System.Collections.Generic.List{Goedel.Cryptography.KeyPairAdvanced}@)
member.summary: Generate a set of ephemerals for the supported algorithms to offer for key agreement and add to .
member.param: List of extensions to add the ephemerals to.
List of ephemerals that have been offered, if this is not null, the ephemerals in this list will be returned. Otherwise a list will be created and populated with the ephemerals offered.

member.name: M:Goedel.Protocol.Presentation.Credential.AddCredentials(System.Collections.Generic.List{Goedel.Protocol.Presentation.PacketExtension})
member.summary: Add an extension containing this credential to .
member.param: List of extensions to add the credential to.

member.name: M:Goedel.Protocol.Presentation.Credential.GetCredentials(System.Collections.Generic.List{Goedel.Protocol.Presentation.PacketExtension})
member.summary: Add an extension containing this credential to .
member.param: List of extensions to add the credential to.

member.name: M:Goedel.Protocol.Presentation.Credential.SelectKey(System.Collections.Generic.List{Goedel.Protocol.Presentation.PacketExtension})
member.summary: Select a private key compatible with the ephemeral keys offered in and return the private key and ephemeral chosen.
member.param: List of extensions offering ephemeral keys to perform a key agreement against.
member.returns: The private key and public key.

member.name: M:Goedel.Protocol.Presentation.Credential.SelectKey(System.String,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Return a private key and public key compatible with the values specified by and . chosen.
member.param: Ephemeral data specifying a public key
member.returns: The ephemeral private key and credential public key.

member.name: M:Goedel.Protocol.Presentation.Credential.SelectKey
member.summary: Return a private ephemeral key and compatible public key from the credential keys
member.returns: The ephemeral private key and credential public key.

member.name: M:Goedel.Protocol.Presentation.Credential.SelectKey(System.Collections.Generic.List{Goedel.Cryptography.KeyPairAdvanced},System.String)
member.summary: Select an ephemeral from that is compatible with the creedential key .
member.param: If specified, the first ephemeral in the list compatible with the specified key will be used.
List of ephemerals previously offered to perform a key agreement against.
member.returns: The ephemeral private key and credential public key.

member.summary: Request establishment of a client connection to the endpoint
member.param: Optional payload. Note that this is sent enclair if is null.
The host credential. If not null, the payload is sent encrypted under this credential.

member.name: M:Goedel.Protocol.Presentation.Listener.Accept(Goedel.Protocol.Presentation.Packet,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Accept the inbound connection request described in .
member.param: Optional payload response. This is always encryted under the host credential at minimum.
member.returns: The host connection. This may be used to wait for inbound requests from the connection.

member.summary: Defer creation of a host connection by sending a challenge to the source.
member.param: Optional payload response. This is always returned enclair.

member.summary: Refuse an inbound connection.
member.param: Optional payload response. This is always returned enclair.
